See where vessels congregate

A global database of anchorage locations of various vessels provided by Global Fishing Watch has been utilized. Checkout the geospatial visualization of these anchorages, majorly ports in the ASEAN India region.

Fish smarter

Summer, winter, spring, and fall; we guarantee abundant catch for all! Our intelligent Fishing Spots Finder points you to the fishing spots within a 10km radius from your current GPS location.

Who's fishing

Our Fishing Activity Detector can be used to determine the country of origin, geartype and possibility of fishing in real-time. This intelligent module uses a Decision Tree Classifier for accurately predicting the geartype, and further using the AIS message features passed to a Dense Neural Network to predict if a vessel is fishing in a given area and at a given time.

Find everything about a vessel

Search a vessel by MMSI, and pull up its historical track in a spatio-temporal interactive map.

What's weird

A number of instances can be drawn from AIS messages where shipping vessels do not follow the path they are supposed to or shut down their AIS devices. Our Anomaly Detector studies the normal behavior of all the vessels and alerts about such anomalous behavior with the help of a Recurrent Neural Network

How's the weather

Explore the predictions of temperature, clouds, precipitation, wind speed and sea level pressure using the OpenWeather API.
